about_the_game:
.
Flips¿de is an RPG, inspired by early 90’s classics such as Earthbound and the Final Fantasy series. Also, sarcasm and puns. With wild landscapes and crazy characters, follow Sam and her roommates as they race against time and reason to fix a mysterious leak in their apartment, before their landlord comes to inspect in the morning!
.
Meet Sam. Part-time barista. Self-described clumsy, awkward, and a little lame. She lives with her endlessly creative sister, Myra, the strong and confident Danny, and Frankie, who is insanely smart. Sam? Well, she’s just Sam. When Sam is transported to a strange new world through a mysterious leak in her bedroom, she will have to wrestle with these notions of herself as she is called to action by a bumbling monarch to save the world. With the help of her friends, Sam must find her strength to travel this nonsensical world, and find a way to stop the leak in her bedroom in time for the apartment inspection!
.
Explore The Flips¿de, meeting strange new people in bizarre worlds born from the discarded thoughts and dreams of everyone in the real world! Fight mailboxes, and other assorted sentient objects! Explore beautiful, wacky, sometimes unsettling worlds! Get lost in a killer soundtrack! Help Sam and her friends save their apartment and get their security deposit back!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better

short_description: Flips¿de is an RPG where Sam and her roommates are getting ready to move out of their apartment, but the night before they leave, a mysterious leak leads to a strange world with even stranger people. Can Sam navigate this world, fix the leak, and get her security deposit back?
